div.p: Anatomical location or specimen further detailing directionality. Codes are from NCI

publisher.value: HL7 Patient Care and Clinical Information Modeling Initiative Work Groups

description.value: Anatomical location or specimen further detailing directionality. Codes are from NCI

display.value: ANTERIOR Denoting the front portion of the body or a structure.

definition.value: ANTERIOR Denoting the front portion of the body or a structure.

display.value: APICAL Relating to or located at the apex.

definition.value: APICAL Relating to or located at the apex.

display.value: BASAL Relating to or located at the lowest portion of a structure.

definition.value: BASAL Relating to or located at the lowest portion of a structure.

display.value: CAUDAL Toward the tail in a body.

definition.value: CAUDAL Toward the tail in a body.

display.value: CENTRAL A point or area that is approximately central within some larger region or structure.

definition.value: CENTRAL A point or area that is approximately central within some larger region or structure.

display.value: CRANIAL Toward the head in a body.

definition.value: CRANIAL Toward the head in a body.

display.value: DEEP Extending relatively far inward.

definition.value: DEEP Extending relatively far inward.

display.value: DISTAL Situated farthest from a point of reference.

definition.value: DISTAL Situated farthest from a point of reference.

display.value: DORSAL Pertaining to the back or upper surface of the body.

definition.value: DORSAL Pertaining to the back or upper surface of the body.

display.value: DORSOLATERAL Toward the back and side of a body.

definition.value: DORSOLATERAL Toward the back and side of a body.

display.value: FORE Of or involving the front of a main body.

definition.value: FORE Of or involving the front of a main body.

display.value: HIND Of or involving the back of a main body.

definition.value: HIND Of or involving the back of a main body.

display.value: INFERIOR Pertaining to a point below a given reference point.

definition.value: INFERIOR Pertaining to a point below a given reference point.

display.value: INNER Inside or closer to the inside of the body or object.

definition.value: INNER Inside or closer to the inside of the body or object.

display.value: INTERMEDIATE Located between two points or extremes.

definition.value: INTERMEDIATE Located between two points or extremes.

display.value: LOWER The bottom one of two.

definition.value: LOWER The bottom one of two.

display.value: MEDIAL Toward the middle or in a limb toward the median plane.

definition.value: MEDIAL Toward the middle or in a limb toward the median plane.

display.value: MIDLINE A medial line, especially the medial line or medial plane of the body (or some part of the body).

definition.value: MIDLINE A medial line, especially the medial line or medial plane of the body (or some part of the body).

display.value: NASAL Of, or related to, or in the direction of the nose.

definition.value: NASAL Of, or related to, or in the direction of the nose.

display.value: OUTER Being on or toward the outside of the body or object.

definition.value: OUTER Being on or toward the outside of the body or object.

display.value: PERIPHERAL On or near an edge or constituting an outer boundary;the outer area.

definition.value: PERIPHERAL On or near an edge or constituting an outer boundary;the outer area.

display.value: POSTERIOR Denoting the back portion of the body or a structure.

definition.value: POSTERIOR Denoting the back portion of the body or a structure.

display.value: ROSTRAL Toward the muzzle in the head.

definition.value: ROSTRAL Toward the muzzle in the head.

display.value: SUPERFICIAL Of or pertaining to the exterior surface.

definition.value: SUPERFICIAL Of or pertaining to the exterior surface.

display.value: SUPERIOR Pertaining to a point above a given reference point.

definition.value: SUPERIOR Pertaining to a point above a given reference point.

display.value: SURFACE The extended two-dimensional outer layer or area of a three-dimensional object.

definition.value: SURFACE The extended two-dimensional outer layer or area of a three-dimensional object.

display.value: TEMPORAL Of, or related to, anatomic sites that are located in the cranium, brain, and eye.

definition.value: TEMPORAL Of, or related to, anatomic sites that are located in the cranium, brain, and eye.

display.value: TIP The pointed end of a structure.

definition.value: TIP The pointed end of a structure.

display.value: UPPER The top one of two.

definition.value: UPPER The top one of two.

display.value: VENTRAL Pertaining to the front or lower surface of the body.

definition.value: VENTRAL Pertaining to the front or lower surface of the body.

display.value: VENTROLATERAL Of or pertaining to the front and side of a main body.

definition.value: VENTROLATERAL Of or pertaining to the front and side of a main body.
